TopicTitle: Don't send your engineers or scientists without a pilot or SAS equipment.

Articles.Content:
You've been warned.

(Keeping that pod retrograde so it doesn't burn up on reentry is a challenge)
Yep, having pilots is now even more important. Will keep in mind ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
